node.statement: REFUTED (repairable). Three errors found, two blocking: (1) MAJOR [1.6.1.3]: Duality pairing condition stated as 'alpha + beta > 0' is wrong — correct condition is alpha - beta > 0 (i.e., alpha > beta) in the notation used, or equivalently s_1 + s_2 > 0 for the sum of actual Besov regularities. (2) MAJOR [1.6.1.4]: Duality bound uses regularity sum = 0 (borderline case where the bilinear estimate fails); must use a strictly positive gap, e.g., pair C^{k/2+2delta} with C^{-k/2-delta}. (3) MINOR [1.6.1.2]: Besov space inclusion direction reversed. All conclusions are ultimately CORRECT — errors are expositional. Fix: replace alpha+beta>0 with alpha-beta>0, introduce regularity gap in duality bound, remove false inclusion.
